cleaned_text: For anyone 6 months or older, we are offering COVID vaccination sites. This includes primary vaccination and booster shots. We stock two COVID vaccines: Moderna and Pfizer. After reviewing the information on the [Dept of Public Health website](https://www.mass.gov/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19) to check your eligibility, please call the number that corresponds to the location at which you would like to receive your vaccine, and a patient service representative will help you schedule your appointment. Vaccination appointments for this age group are available at this time only for our own primary care pediatric patients. Please visit the [website](https://www.mass.gov/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19), to find out your eligibility for vaccine, or answer any other questions about COVID-19. Please note, to schedule a vaccine appointment, you must be registered with Massachusetts General Brigham. If not, please call [866-211-6588](tel:18662116588) to register. Please remember to bring your vaccination card to properly verify your previous vaccine accurately. We STRONGLY urge anyone eligible to get all vaccine doses appropriate over time. If you have had COVID 19 infection, you may wait 3 months until your next eligible vaccine dose, or confer with your healthcare team as to the best timing for it. However, please review the information on the Department of Public Health website first, where you may get the answers, you need. Vaccination continues to dramatically reduce the risk of hospitalization and death if you get infected.
